description:
Lightweight sun protection they (hopefully) won’t yank off immediately. This sun hat protects little noggins from harmful rays with a generous rear cape, UPF 50+ rating and a quick-release chin strap that keeps it in place.

  • Lightweight, breathable fabric keeps your little one cool and is bluesign®-approved
  • Crushable brim design lets you stow it quickly
  • Soft rear cape is stroller-friendly and offers complete sun protection
  • Quick-release chin strap secures hat against wind gusts and little fingers
  • Fits head circumferences 40-45 cm
name: Sunday Afternoons Sunsprout Hat - Infants
